section.text: *NOTE: This section was created by emergency legislation that will expire on January 23, 2024.*
section.heading: Parties.
section.text: Parties to a guardianship proceeding shall be the vulnerable youth, the proposed guardian, and the vulnerable youth's parents. The court may, at its discretion, on its own motion, or in response to a motion for joinder or intervention, join additional parties to a guardianship proceeding.
section.codify:annotation: For temporary (90 days) creation of § 16-2399.03, see § 16-2399.03 of Vulnerable Youth Guardianship Protection Congressional Review Emergency Amendment Act of 2023 (D.C. Act 25-260, Oct. 25, 2023, 0 DCR 0).

For temporary (90 days) creation of this section, see § 16-2399.03 of Vulnerable Youth Guardianship Protection Congressional Review Emergency Amendment Act of 2023 (D.C. Act 25-260, Oct. 25, 2023, 0 DCR 0).
